introduction.label: Heritage House
introduction.title: OPHIR — Heritage House
introduction.paragraph1: OPHIR is an independent heritage house based in Paris. We support families, the diaspora, and international capital in their challenges of acquisition, transmission, and heritage real estate allocation, in France and internationally.
introduction.paragraph2: Our approach is based on advice, discretion, and knowledge of Parisian heritage dynamics. We operate outside public channels, through mandate or introduction, serving family trajectories or long-term allocations.

parisPatrimoine.label: Living Heritage
parisPatrimoine.title: Paris as a
parisPatrimoine.description: Paris remains one of the world's major heritage capitals. Its real estate market, structured by stone, family, and transmission, plays a central role in anchoring, inheritance, and portfolio diversification strategies.

diasporaBridge.label: International
diasporaBridge.title: A bridge between Paris, the Diaspora
diasporaBridge.description: OPHIR operates as a bridge between the diaspora and Paris. We support families and entrepreneurs who wish to build or consolidate their Parisian real estate heritage from abroad — through trust, continuity, or projection.

confidentiality.label: Our Approach
confidentiality.title: Confidentiality, advisory
confidentiality.description: Because a large part of heritage transactions do not take place on the public market, OPHIR operates in confidential mode, by mandate or off-market, with identified and qualified counterparts.

hero.title: Terms of
hero.subtitle: The terms governing access and use of the OPHIR ESTATE website, a heritage house based in Paris.

object.title: Purpose
object.content:
These Terms of Use govern access and use of the ophirestate.com website (the "Site"), operated by OPHIR ESTATE, a heritage house based in Paris.

By accessing the Site, the user accepts these terms.

nature.title: Nature of Information
nature.content:
The Site presents general information about OPHIR, its heritage advisory, mandate and representation activities.

The Site does not constitute a public real estate agency, does not offer listings, does not engage in real estate advertising, nor public offerings.

No element of the Site constitutes a public offer, solicitation or investment recommendation.

access.title: Site Access and Use
access.content:
The user may access the Site for personal or professional information purposes.

Any reproduction, misappropriation, commercial use or unauthorized distribution is prohibited without prior written consent.

precontract.title: Pre-contractual Contact
precontract.content:
The Site's contact forms constitute a pre-contractual step.

Any heritage operation (acquisition, disposal, allocation, succession, off-market or introduction) requires the signature of a mandate between the user and OPHIR.

mandate.title: Mandate & Advisory
mandate.content:
OPHIR operates in heritage advisory and representation under mandate.

OPHIR is not a mass-market real estate agency and does not operate through listing exposure or mass-market.

regulation.title: Regulatory Compliance (T Card)
regulation.content:
For transactional operations subject to French law, OPHIR holds the T Card, a mandatory license under the Hoguet law for real estate transaction activities.

This framework applies only within the scope of a signed mandate.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality & Off-market
confidentiality.content:
Part of heritage operations are conducted off-market, in confidential environments.

Any unauthorized disclosure is strictly prohibited.

international.title: International Interactions
international.content:
OPHIR may interact with international clients (families, diaspora, entrepreneurs, allocators, family offices).

These interactions are governed by French law.

liability.title: Liability & Limitations
liability.content:
OPHIR makes reasonable efforts to ensure the accuracy of published information.

**OPHIR cannot be held liable for:**
• Indirect damages
• Data loss
• Decisions made solely based on the Site
• External content beyond its control

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content:
All content (texts, identity, structure, brand and concept) is protected by intellectual property law.

Any reproduction requires prior written authorization.

law.title: Applicable Law & Jurisdiction
law.content:
These terms are governed by French law.

Exclusive jurisdiction is attributed to the Paris courts, unless otherwise provided by law.

modification.title: Modification of Terms
modification.content:
OPHIR may update these terms to account for regulatory or operational changes.

The user is invited to consult them regularly.

**Last update: January 2025**
